name: jaggy
description: is Converting to SVG by pixels

scripts.localhost: cd public && open http://localhost:8000 && python -m SimpleHTTPServer
scripts.prebuild: browserify src/jaggy.browser.coffee --debug -t coffeeify --extension .coffee -t [ browserify-ngannotate --x .coffee ] | exorcist public/jaggy.js.map -b . > public/jaggy.js
scripts.build: uglifyjs public/jaggy.js --in-source-map public/jaggy.js.map  --compres --mangle --source-map public/jaggy.min.js.map --source-map-url jaggy.min.js.map > public/jaggy.min.js
scripts.update: git tag v$(opc package version) && git push --tags
scripts.prepublish: node -e "if(process.env.TRAVIS){}else{process.exit(1)}" && npm run compile || echo skip prepublish
